body_html:
@KillPinguin thank for bringing this to our attention.
@jart The code doesn't compile with fp16. We would welcome a PR adding support. In the meantime, I'll change the code just skip the optimization without spamming the error log. It is at worst a missed optimization, but certainly not an error.

body:
@KillPinguin thank for bringing this to our attention.
@jart The code doesn't compile with fp16. We would welcome a PR adding support. In the meantime, I'll change the code just skip the optimization without spamming the error log. It is at worst a missed optimization, but certainly not an error.
